import React from 'react' import '../../pages/Slideer/Slideer.css' import axios from "axios" import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const SliderDetail = () => { const[slider,setSlider]=useState([]) const deleteHandler=async(e)=>{ await axios.delete(`http://localhost:3001/books/${_id}`) .then(res=>res.data) } const updateHandler=async(e)=>{ await axios.put(`http://localhost:3001/books/${_id}`) .then(res=>res.data) } useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/slider') .then(res => setSlider(res.data.sliders)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) },[]) console.log(slider); return (
Add Slider { slider.map((sliders)=>(
{sliders.description}

{sliders.title}

UPDATE SLIDER DELETE SLIDER
)) }
) } export default SliderDetail
